video.title: Preachers' Daughters
video.synopsis: In this reality series, three pastors' daughters struggle to balance their lives, their values and their parents' strict expectations.

episodes.synopsis: The daughters prove they're no angels when Taylor shares a fantasy; Olivia questions her daughter's paternity; and Kolby wants permission to date.
episodes.title: Daddy's Little Angels

episodes.synopsis: Olivia learns the results of the paternity test; Taylor lies to her parents and attends a co-ed party; Teryn's confession shocks Kolby and her family.
episodes.title: Lead Us Not into Temptation

episodes.synopsis: Kolby questions her beliefs about premarital sex; Olivia meets with a lawyer after contacting her baby's father; a new boy comes into Taylor's life.
episodes.title: Tempted by the Fruit of Another

episodes.synopsis: Nikita enlists his daughters to help rekindle his relationship with Victoria; Taylor double-dates with her parents; Olivia renews an old romance.
episodes.title: Turning Water to Wine

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Victoria go on a date for the first time in seven years, leading Kolby to think twice about her relationship with Micah.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Olivia is at odds with her parents over their beliefs on Halloween; Kolby celebrates her first Halloween ever with a house party.
episodes.title: Saints vs. Sinners

episodes.synopsis: Marie makes Taylor take a purity class; Olivia visits her sister in L.A. and poses for risqué photos; Kolby and her sisters have a wild weekend.
episodes.title: Naughty and Nice

episodes.synopsis: Mark gets Olivia to lead an outing for troubled teens; Ken and Taylor visit a Christian college; Victoria shares a secret from her past with Kolby.
episodes.title: When the Cat's Away, the Mice Will Play

episodes.synopsis: Taylor's 18th birthday party gets wild; Victoria loosens the reins on Kolby dating; Olivia worries that her partying past could affect her daughter.
episodes.title: Hallelujah

episodes.synopsis: The Perrys, Colemans and Koloffs sit down on the couch again to reveal never-before-seen moments and review their adventures.
episodes.title: Behind The Pulpit: Preachers' Daughters Clip Show

episodes.synopsis: Kolby makes a decision about the direction of her life, Tori gets tossed from her apartment, and Taylor films a music video her parents disapprove of.
episodes.title: Raising Hell

episodes.synopsis: Kolby's dad throws cold water on her plans, Taylor looks for a nice Christian boy to date, and Megan gets in trouble over a tweet about drinking.
episodes.title: Holier Than Thou

episodes.synopsis: Courtney and Tori lie about playing tennis to see boys, Taylor gets two prom dates, and Victoria and Kolby secretly take Teryn's daughter to church.
episodes.title: Father, Forgive Me

episodes.synopsis: Teryn is a no-show for Kolby's church event, Megan faces taking a drug test, and Tori is evicted again -- this time by her parents.
episodes.title: Papa Don't Preach

episodes.synopsis: Taylor tries out for a part in a zombie movie, Tori blows off a job interview, and Victoria talks to the girls about premarital sex.
episodes.title: Long Way Home

episodes.synopsis: Megan acts out after receiving a reprimand from church members, Teryn frets about the state of her marriage, and Taylor cuts class.
episodes.title: Damned If You Do...

episodes.synopsis: Taylor gets bad news about her father's health, Megan defies her parents and goes on a date, and Tori and Courtney's parents plan a family swamp tour.
episodes.title: Breaking Bad Girls

episodes.synopsis: Tori parties and faces disapproval from her friends, Kolby sneaks off on a trip, and Taylor holds a bikini car wash to raise funds to help her father.
episodes.title: Caught in the Act

episodes.synopsis: Kolby and her sisters throw a bachelorette party for Teryn, Megan goes on a coed camping trip, and Tori faces the music about her partying.
episodes.title: Hallowed Be My Name

episodes.synopsis: Megan's parents go to therapy, Teryn and Chad renew their wedding vows, and Tori's parents stage an intervention for her.
episodes.title: Good Girl, Bad Girl
